#summary class Bitmap
#sidebar API_TOC

== Fields ==
  * $parent - Parent bitmap (if this bitmap is a slice). NULL if doesn't have parent.
  * $x, $y - Slice $x, $y coords of the parent.
  * $w, $h - Slice width and height.
  * $cx, $cy - Center of this image.

== Methods ==
  * __construct($w, $h)
  * slice($x, $y, $w, $h, $cx = 0, $cy = 0)
  * clear($r = 0.0, $g = 0.0, $b = 0.0, $a = 0.0)
  * blit([Bitmap] $src, $x, $y, $size = 1.0, $rotation = 0, $alpha = 1.0, [PixelShader] $shader = NULL)

== Static Methods ==
  * fromFile($file)
  * fromString($data)
